payload.text: One of our consultants will be able to assist you with this query. If you would like assistance, please select the 'Chat with consultant' button.
One of our consultants will be able to assist you with this query. If you would like assistance, please select the 'Chat with consultant' button.

To initiate an asset transfer if you hold an individual HIN:
1. Select 'Go to page'.
2. In the 'Transfers' section, select the relevant 'Australian Standard Transfer' option, then follow the prompts.

To initiate an asset transfer if you do not hold an individual HIN:
1. Select 'Go to page'.
2. In the 'Transfers' section, select 'Offline asset transfer - Investments' then follow the prompts.
